mainHero.title: Are They Moving?
mainHero.subtitle: Find Out Now
mainHero.description: The quickest and most effective system to track your past clients and learn if they have moved and/or are moving soon so you can ensure that they remember to repurchase your product and services for wherever life is taking them.

items.title: One Click Upload and Update
items.description: No matter the size of your client list, just make sure the columns fit our guidelines and you'll be on your way in seconds.

items.title: Whatever you offer, your customers want it!
items.description: You've sold them once, now capitalize again!

features.title: Top User Experience
features.subtitle: Resell To Your Favorite Customers
features.description: Acquiring a customer is expensive, never lose one again because they moved and forgot about you

items.name: Backtested Data
items.description: Tracing back the history of your customers to demonstrate the expected results before you even have to sign a contract.

items.name: Updated Daily
items.description: Daily updates on which of your customers have moved, listed their home, or put their home up for rent so you are the first to know and first to act.

items.name: Easily Integratable
items.description: Customer service and development support to work with whatever type of customer list you have and ensure a no hastle workflow.

items.name: Delivering Premier Leads
items.description: Your business has already done the hard part of selling to these customers something that they love. We're here to offer you the easy chance of catching them right when they'll need your product again!

sections.name: Contact Us
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
